item.description:
Hi all,

Bike ride monday, all welcome. We will be getting the 10.15 am train from North Station to Salem and then making our way to Marblehead and around the harbour, some lunch, some drinks and some sun, heading back when we feel like it. Some of the trail we will be taking will be gravel, so mountain or hybrid bike would be best.

The MBTAallows bikes on some T lines, check their website for details. Aim to be at North Station atleast 15 mins before the train to get your ticket which is about $7.

Let me know if your coming and I'll keep and eye out for you.

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Bike Ride - Marblehead
